DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , single center , randomize non-inferiority study , include 60 patient de novo coronary artery disease . Patients follow 30 day , 3 , 6 12 month . At 3 month patient submit angiographic OCT evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: OCT Evaluation 3 Months After Sirolimus Eluting Stent Implantation
DOC.criteria: one two de novo lesion ( > 50 % visual estimation ) lesion diameter 2.5 3.5 mm lesion length 33 mm . MI within last 72 hour restenotic lesion .
